content.text:
All I Want For Christmas Is You
Carey Mariah

Capo 3.


[Intro]

[ch]G[/ch] [ch]Bm[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]Eb[/ch] [ch]G[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]Eb[/ch]

[ch]Bm[/ch] 
there is just one thing I need 
[ch]C[/ch] 
I don't care about the presents 
[ch]Eb[/ch] 
underneath the Christmas tree 
[ch]G[/ch]
I just want you for my ow n 
[ch]Em[/ch]                  [ch]Eb[/ch] 
more than you could ever  know 
[ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]E7[/ch] 
Make my wish come  true... 
[ch]Am[/ch]                   [ch]D[/ch] 
All I want for Chris tmas is you 


[Instrumental]

[ch]G[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] 


[Verse 1]

[ch]G[/ch] 
I don't want a lot for Christmas there is just one thing I need 
[ch]C[/ch]                               [ch]Eb[/ch] 
I don't care about the presents  underneath the Christmas tree 
[ch]G[/ch] 
I don't need to hang my stocking there upon the fireplace 
[ch]C[/ch]                                [ch]Eb[/ch] 
Santa Claus won't make me happy  with a toy on Christmas day 


[Hook]

[ch]G[/ch]                            [ch]Em[/ch]                      [ch]Eb[/ch] 
I just want you for my  own  more than you could ever  know 
[ch]G[/ch]                  [ch]E7[/ch]       [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch] 
Make my wish come  true...  All I want for  Christmas is you, you, baby 

[ch]G[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] 


[Verse 2]

[ch]G[/ch] 
I won't ask for much this Christmas I won't even wish for snow 
[ch]C[/ch]                               [ch]Eb[/ch] 
I'm just gonna keep on waiting  underneath the mistletoe 
[ch]G[/ch] 
I won't make a list and send it to the North Pole for Saint Nick 
[ch]C[/ch]                           [ch]Eb[/ch] 
I won't even stay awake to  hear those magic reindeer click 


[Hook]

[ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]Em[/ch]             [ch]Eb[/ch] 
'Cause I just want you here to night  holding on to me so  tight 
[ch]G[/ch]                [ch]E7[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch] 
What more can I  do, baby  All I want for  Christmas is you 

[ch]G[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] 


[Bridge]

[ch]B[/ch]                           [ch]Em[/ch] 
All the lights are shining  brightly everywhere 
[ch]B[/ch]                          [ch]Em[/ch] 
And the sound of children  laughter fills the air 
[ch]Eb[/ch]                        [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]E7[/ch] 
and everyone is singing   I hear those s leigh bells ringing 
[ch]Am[/ch] 
Santa won't you bring me the one I really need 
  [ch]D[/ch] 
won't you  please bring my baby to me 


[Hook]

[ch]G[/ch] 
Oh I don't want a lot for Christmas this is all I'm asking for 
[ch]C[/ch]                           [ch]Eb[/ch] 
I just want to see my baby  standing right outside my door 
[ch]G[/ch]                          [ch]Em[/ch]                            [ch]Eb[/ch] 
Oh I just want him for my  own  more than you could ever  know 
[ch]G[/ch]              [ch]E7[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch] 
Make my wish come  true, al l I want for Ch ristmas is you... 


[Outro]

content.text:
All I Want for Christmas is You
by Mariah Carey

There're several chordcharts for this song, but all of them seem to kind of miss something,
whether it's a chord, or simply get something wrong. I'm hoping mine gives you the best of all.

Standard tuning, no capo. Key of G, typical for Soprano singers.
See below for vocal guide for key selection.

Chord voicings I use (All open unless otherwise noted):

G:         320033 
Gmaj7:     354433 (Emaj7-shape Barre on 3)
C:         X32010 
D:         XX0232 
Bm11:      X20230 
Am7-5/Eb:  X6758X  Another chart calls this Cm6/Eb and voices it XX1213. I find mine easier on the fingers.
B/D#:      X64442 (A/C# - shape Barre on 2) If you struggle with this, you can voice it open as X6444X
G/D:       XX0022 
E7:        020100 
Am7:       X02213 
D7:        XX0212 
Cm:        X35543 (Am - shape Barre on 3)
D#:        X65343 (C  - shape Barre on 3) Alternatively, X68886 (A - shape Barre on 6)
Em9:       022032 (if tricky, play Em7, as 022030)

************************************

LYRIC GUIDE FOR NON-SPANISH SPEAKER:

Note: Luis Fonsi's original version translated to English 
      to help non-spanish speakers feel the song's emotion.


“Despacito” or “Slowly” 

Fonsi:

Sí, sabes que ya llevo un rato mirándote,
Tengo que bailar contigo hoy.
Vi que tu mirada ya estaba llamándome,
Muéstrame el camino que yo voy.

Yes, you know I’ve been looking at you for a while,

I have to dance with you today.

I saw that your look was already calling me,

show me the way and I’ll go. 

¡Oh!
Tú, tú eres el imán y yo soy el metal.
Me voy acercando y voy armando el plan,
sólo con pensarlo se acelera el pulso.
Ya, ya me está gustando más de lo normal.
Todos mis sentidos van pidiendo más,
Esto hay que tomarlo sin ningún apuro.

Oh!

You, you’re the magnet and I’m the metal.

I’m getting closer and coming up with a plan,

just thinking about it accelerates my pulse.

I’m already enjoying it more than normal.

All of my senses are asking for more,

this has to be done without a hurry.

[Chorus]
Despacito
Quiero respirar tu cuello despacito.
Deja que te diga cosas al oído,
para que te acuerdes si no estás conmigo.
Despacito
Quiero desnudarte a besos despacito.
Firmar en las paredes de tu laberinto
y hacer de tu cuerpo todo un manuscrito

Quiero ver bailar tu pelo, quiero ser tu ritmo
Que le enseñes a mi boca, tus lugares favoritos.
Déjame sobrepasar tus zonas de peligro,
hasta provocar tus gritos
y que olvides tu apellido

[Chorus]
Slowly

I want to breathe your neck slowly.

Let me whisper things in your ear,

that you’ll remember when you’re not with me.

Slowly

I want to undress you with kisses slowly.

Sign the walls of your labyrinth

and turn your body into a manuscript.  


I want to see your hair dance, I want to be your rhythm

I want you to show my mouth your favorite places.

Let me surpass your danger zone,

until it makes you scream

and makes you forget your last name. 


Daddy Yankee:

Si te pido un beso, ven, dámelo. Yo sé que estás pensándolo.
Llevo tiempo intentándolo, mami, esto es dando y dándolo.
Sabes que tu corazón conmigo te hace bam-bam.
Sabes que esa beba está buscando de mi bam-bam.
Ven, prueba de mi boca para ver cómo te sabe.
Quiero, quiero, quiero ver cuánto amor a ti te cabe.
Yo no tengo prisa, yo me quiero dar el viaje.
Empezamos lento, después salvaje.

Pasito a pasito, suave suavecito.
Nos vamos pegando, poquito a poquito.
Cuando tú me besas con esa destreza
veo que eres malicia con delicadeza.
Pasito a pasito, suave suavecito.
Nos vamos pegando, poquito a poquito.
Y es que esa belleza es un rompecabezas,
pero pa’ montarlo aquí tengo la pieza.
¡Oye!

If I ask you for a kiss, come on, give it to me. I know you’re thinking about it.

I’ve spent a while trying, mami, this is give and giving.

You know your heart with me goes bam-bam.

You know what this babe wants from me is bam-bam.

Come, taste my mouth to see how it tastes to you.

I want, want, want to see how much love fits in you.

I’m in no rush, I want to take the ride.

We’ll start slow and then go wild. 


Step by step, gentle gently.

We’ll get closer, little by little. 
When you kiss me with that skill,

I see that you are malice with finesse. 

Step by step, gentle gently.

We’ll get closer, little by little.
This beauty is a puzzle,

but to put it together I have the piece. 
Oye!

[CHORUS, 2x]

Luis Fonsi:
Despacito
Vamo’ a hacerlo en una playa en Puerto Rico,
hasta que las olas griten “¡Ay, Bendito!”
para que mi sello se quede contigo.
¡Bailalo!

Slowly

We’re going to do it on a beach in Puerto Rico,

until the waves scream “Oh, Lord!”

so that my seal [likely meaning mark or impression] stays with you.

Dance!
******************************************************************

name: I Will Follow You Into The Dark
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Intro]
[ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]F[/ch] [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]F[/ch] [ch]C[/ch]
[ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]F[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] (Barchord)
[ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]F[/ch] [ch]A[/ch] [ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]Bbm[/ch] (Into [ch]F[/ch] with F-C note progression beginning)


[Verse]
F (F-C Root note going)
Love of mine,
                 Dm (D-A Root note going)
Someday you will die
                      Bb (strumming)
But I will be close behind
           [ch]F[/ch]                  [ch]C[/ch]
I will follow, you into the dark

F (F-C Root note going)
No blinding light
                        Dm (D-A Root note going)
Or tunnels to gates of white
                           [ch]Bb[/ch]
Just our hands clasped so tight
         [ch]F[/ch]                   [ch]C[/ch]
Waiting for, the hint of a spark 


[Chorus]
   [ch]Dm[/ch]                 [ch]F[/ch]               [ch]Bb[/ch]           [ch]F[/ch] [ch]C[/ch]
If heaven and hell decide, that they both are satisfied
[ch]Dm[/ch]               [ch]F[/ch]                 [ch]C[/ch] (bar chord)
Illuminate the "no's", on their vacancy signs
[ch]Dm[/ch]                        [ch]F[/ch]              [ch]A[/ch]      [ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]C[/ch]
If there's no one beside you, when your soul embarks
Bb                 Bbm            F (Begin F-C root again)
Then I will follow you into the dark


[Verse]
F (F-C root note going)
Catholic school
                      Dm (D-A root note)
As vicious as roman rule
            [ch]Bb[/ch]
I got my knuckles bruised 
      [ch]F[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]
By a lady in black

       F (F-C root note)              Dm                          Bb
And I held my tongue as she told me, "son, fear is the heart of love." 
       [ch]F[/ch]         [ch]C[/ch]
So I never went back


[Chorus]
   [ch]Dm[/ch]                [ch]F[/ch]                [ch]Bb[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch] [ch]C[/ch]
If heaven and hell decide, that they both are satisfied
[ch]Dm[/ch]                [ch]F[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch] (bar chord)
Illuminate the "no's", on their vacancy signs
[ch]Dm[/ch]                        [ch]F[/ch]              [ch]A[/ch]      [ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]C[/ch]
If there's no one beside you, when your soul embarks
Bb                 Bbm            F (Begin F-C root again)
Then I will follow you into the dark

[Verse]
[ch]F[/ch]                           [ch]Dm[/ch]
You and me, have seen everything to see
                  [ch]Bb[/ch]
From Bangkok to Calgary  
          [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch] (barchord)
And the soles of your shoes
    [ch]F[/ch]                                    [ch]Dm[/ch]
Are all worn down, the time for sleep is now
                     [ch]Bb[/ch]
But it's nothing to cry about
               [ch]F[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]Dm[/ch]                  [ch]Bbm[/ch] 
Because we'll hold each other soon, in the blackest of rooms 


[Chorus]
[ch]Dm[/ch]                   [ch]F[/ch]                [ch]Bb[/ch]            [ch]F[/ch] [ch]C[/ch]
If heaven and hell decide, that they both are satisfied
[ch]Dm[/ch]               [ch]F[/ch]                 [ch]C[/ch] (bar chord)
Illuminate the "no's", on their vacancy signs
[ch]Dm[/ch]                        [ch]F[/ch]              [ch]A[/ch]      [ch]Dm[/ch] [ch]C[/ch]
If there's no one beside you, when your soul embarks
Bb                 Bbm            F    (run down to Dm on D string)
Then I will follow you into the dark
[ch]Bb[/ch]                 [ch]Bbm[/ch]            [ch]F[/ch]    
Then I will follow you into the dark


*************************************************************************************
This song is from the upcoming release, "Plans" which is coming August 30th. I have a
copy already and thought I would do those looking for the chords when it's released a
service. It's a great, sparse little folk song that emphasizes the bottom half of the
chords and strums mostly on the upbeats. The way this is done is by picking the bottom
two notes of the chord on the downbeats of the verses. 

For example, with the F chord, it's played something like this, but the upper half of
the chord is strummed more than once in the rise and fall of the strumming hand: 

e   1      1
B   1      1
G   2      2
D   3      3 
A   3      3
[ch]E[/ch]

The chorus is pretty much exactly like the introduction.

              [ch]Am[/ch]
or tunnels to gates of white,
               [ch]F[/ch]
just our hands clasped so tight
         [ch]C[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]
waiting for the hint of a spark. 


[Chorus]
     
     [ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]      
If heaven and hell decide that they both are satisfied,
  [ch]Am[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
illuminate the noes on their vacancy signs.
     [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]                 [ch]E[/ch]      [ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]    
If there's no one beside you when your soul embarks
     [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]Fm[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]
then I'll follow you into the dark.


[2nd Verse]
     
   [ch]C[/ch]
In Catholic school,
              [ch]Am[/ch]
as vicious as Roman rule,
          [ch]F[/ch] 
I got my knuckles bruised 
     [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]
by a lady in black.

      [ch]C[/ch]
And I held my tongue 
       [ch]Am[/ch]
as she told me "Son, 
            [ch]F[/ch]
fear is the heart of love".
     [ch]C[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]
So I never went back.


[Chorus]
     
     [ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]      
If heaven and hell decide that they both are satisfied,
  [ch]Am[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
illuminate the noes on their vacancy signs.
     [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]                 [ch]E[/ch]      [ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]    
If there's no one beside you when your soul embarks
     [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]Fm[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]
then I'll follow you into the dark.


[3rd Verse]

[ch]C[/ch]
You and me
                [ch]Am[/ch]
have seen everything to see
                [ch]F[/ch]
from Bangkok to Calgary, 
        [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]
and the soles of your shoes
 
    [ch]C[/ch]
are all worn down.
             [ch]Am[/ch]
The time for sleep is now
                    [ch]F[/ch]
but it's nothing to cry about  
             [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]      
'cause we'll hold each other soon
       [ch]Am[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]
in the blackest of rooms.


[Chorus]
     
     [ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]      
If heaven and hell decide that they both are satisfied,
  [ch]Am[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
illuminate the noes on their vacancy signs.
     [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]                 [ch]E[/ch]      [ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]    
If there's no one beside you when your soul embarks
     [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]Fm[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]Am[/ch] 
Then I'll follow you into the dark
     [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]Fm[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]    
Then I'll follow you into the dark

Folsom Prison Blues                              Johnny Cash


[ch]G[/ch]             
I hear the train a coming it's rolling round the bend
                                                 [ch]G7[/ch]  
and I ain't seen the sunshine since I don't know when
    [ch]C[/ch]                                              [ch]G[/ch]    
I'm stuck in Folsom Prison and time keeps draggin' on
         [ch]D7[/ch]                                    [ch]G[/ch]
But that train keeps rollin' on down to San Antone

[ch]G[/ch]
When I was just a baby my Mama told me 'Son
                                           [ch]G7[/ch]
always be a good boy; don't you ever play with guns.
      [ch]C[/ch]                                       [ch]G[/ch]
But I shot the man in Reno, just to watch him die
       [ch]D7[/ch]                                           [ch]G[/ch]
when I hear that whistle blowin' I hang my head and cry 

[ch]G[/ch]
I hear the train a coming it's rolling round the bend
                                           [ch]G7[/ch]
And I ain't seen the sunshine since I don't know when
      [ch]C[/ch]                                       [ch]G[/ch]
I'm stuck in Folsom Prison and time keeps dragging on
       [ch]D7[/ch]                                           [ch]G[/ch]
But that train keeps rolling on down to San Antone

[ch]G[/ch] 
When I was just a baby my mama told me Son
                                           [ch]G7[/ch]
Always be a good boy don't ever play with guns
      [ch]C[/ch]                                       [ch]G[/ch]
But I shot a man in Reno just to watch him die
       [ch]D7[/ch]                                           [ch]G[/ch]
When I hear that whistle blowing I hang my head and cry
 
[ch]G[/ch]
I bet there's rich folks eating in a fancy dining car
                                           [ch]G7[/ch]
They're probably drinking coffee and smoking big cigars
      [ch]C[/ch]                                       [ch]G[/ch]
But I know I had it coming I know I can't be free
       [ch]D7[/ch]                                           [ch]G[/ch]
But those people keep a moving and that's what tortures me
 
[ch]G[/ch]
Well if they freed me from this prison  if that railroad train was mine
                                           [ch]G7[/ch]
I bet I'd move on over a little farther down the line
      [ch]C[/ch]                                       [ch]G[/ch]
Far from Folsom Prison that's where I want to stay
       [ch]D7[/ch]                                           [ch]G[/ch]
And I'd let that lonesome whistle blow my blues away
